name: Crash Lander
description:
Crash Lander is a challenging sidescrolling rocket platformer. Manage your fuel, avoid hazards, and work your way down the winding depths. Find your way to the precious checkpoints. You will die.

Point and click your mouse in the direction you want to go. Make sure to feather the thrust for better control. Be mindful of your quickly depleting fuel. Precision is key.

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Jam.
